script.source: if (doc.containsKey('answer_geo.asn') && doc['answer_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('answer_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['answer_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['answer_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['answer_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('backend_geo.asn') && doc['backend_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('backend_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['backend_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['backend_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['backend_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('client_geo.asn') && doc['client_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('client_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['client_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['client_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['client_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('destination_geo.asn') && doc['destination_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('destination_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['destination_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['destination_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['destination_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('dhcp_geo.asn') && doc['dhcp_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('dhcp_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['dhcp_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['dhcp_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['dhcp_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('original_source_geo.asn') && doc['original_source_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('original_source_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['original_source_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['original_source_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['original_source_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('remote_geo.asn') && doc['remote_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('remote_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['remote_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['remote_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['remote_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('source_geo.asn') && doc['source_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('source_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['source_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('xff_geo.asn') && doc['xff_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('xff_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['xff_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['xff_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['xff_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }
